title: Creating new module for PyTorch
body_html:
I was wondering how to go about creating new modules for PyTorch, say a fixed point version of various nn layers. What's the best way to approach ? Is there any pointers where I can refer to to know the complete pipeline from writing C++ code to importing the functionality in python.

Thanks in advance!
